TopicTitle: Mods not working , Pink Kerbal Helmet

Articles.Content:
For some weird reason after the Recent update whenever I put my mods they don't work for some reason except one, and all of them are updated Idk why, please help.

I Checked my game files and ModuleManager is there, so that's not the problem for the mods thing.

Also whenever I go EVA my Kerbal helmet looks like this, If you have any solution please tell me as soon as possible

 

Edited August 3, 2017 by Space_taco

Hi the image you show indicates that a plugin or other file cannot find a specific shader , this could be caused by many things , though without a  zipped copy of the KSP.log all I'm prepared to guess at is that  A, one or more of your mods is not suitable for KSP 1.3  or B the installation of all mods except one is wrong.
